description: RunAsUserStrategyOptions defines the strategy type and any options used to create the strategy. Deprecated: use RunAsUserStrategyOptions from policy API Group instead.

items.description: IDRange provides a min/max of an allowed range of IDs. Deprecated: use IDRange from policy API Group instead.

max.description: max is the end of the range, inclusive.

min.description: min is the start of the range, inclusive.

ranges.description: ranges are the allowed ranges of uids that may be used. If you would like to force a single uid then supply a single range with the same start and end. Required for MustRunAs.

rule.description: rule is the strategy that will dictate the allowable RunAsUser values that may be set.
